Singapore: The Tanjong Pagar Police Station opens, and many Sikh policemen are recruited. Holy Innocents' High School established.
Russia: Witte's Great Spurt increases industrial growth; women banned from mines and children under 12 banned from working in factories
Philippine: Diariong Tagalog is published; first native daily paper, lasted at least three months.
Rizal arrives in the Philippines from Europe via Hong Kong
Rizal forms the La Liga Filipina
Rizal is arrested for establishing the La Liga Filipina
Andres Bonifacio secretly established the Katipunan.
Filipino painter Juan Luna shot dead his wife Paz Pardo De Tavera.
Malta: The Malta Railway reopens, under government management.
Germany: Rudolf Diesel invented the Diesel engine.
Cyprus: Sir Walter Sendall became Crown commissioner.
Colombia: Miguel Antonio Caro is the 4th president of Colombia
Rafael Nuñez is the 5th President of Colombia
